name: Retro Snake
description: Retro Snake is a challenge-based Snake game with retro design that is suitable for all people.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3+ or higher Processor: Dual core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 150 MB available space
